description:
There's no reason to have dirty dishes, even when going fast-and-light. The handles and collapsible design make this sink easy to transport, empty or full. You can minimize your environmental impact by washing your dishes away from the river or lake.

  • Waterproof ultralight 30-denier PU-coated Cordura® fabric has fully taped seams
  • Stainless steel ring keeps rim and broad base prevent collapsing when full
  • Webbing handles are comfortable to hold and allow for easy carrying
  • Stows in included storage pouch for transport
  • Do not use bleach in this sink. It will damage the coating and fabric
name: Sea To Summit Ultra-Sil Kitchen Sink
